result.eng: He loves playing with his ball.
result.ga: Is breá leis imirt lena liathróid
result.orig: Is breá leis imirt lena liathróid
result.html: Is breá leis imirt lena liathróidHe loves playing with his ball.
result.ponchtml: Is breá leis imirt lena liaṫróidHe loves playing with his ball.

result.eng: The ball is high in the air.
result.ga: Tá an liathróid ard san aer
result.orig: Tá an liathróid ard san aer
result.html: Tá an liathróid ard san aerThe ball is high in the air.
result.ponchtml: Tá an liaṫróid ard san aerThe ball is high in the air.

result.html: Buail an liathróidHit the ball!
result.ponchtml: Buail an liaṫróidHit the ball!

result.html: Caith an liathróidThrow the ball!
result.ponchtml: Caiṫ an liaṫróidThrow the ball!

result.eng: He sent the ball across the park.
result.ga: Sheol sé an liathróid trasna na páirce
result.orig: Sheol sé an liathróid trasna na páirce
result.html: Sheol sé an liathróid trasna na páirceHe sent the ball across the park.
result.ponchtml: Ṡeol sé an liaṫróid trasna na páirceHe sent the ball across the park.
